entry.title: FTX Execs Maxed Out Donations to Rep. George Santos
entry.summary: FEC filings have revealed that the New York congressman, under fire for a plethora of lies and misrepresentations, was a favored candidate among FTX’s leadership.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gary Gensler Says There Are Three Ways to Tell If a Crypto Project Is a Scam
entry.summary: “If something looks too good to be true, sometimes they really are,” Gensler said during a Twitter Spaces hosted by the U.S. Army.

entry.title: White House Blames Congress for Failure to Enact Crypto Regulations
entry.summary: Four senior Biden officials penned a note Friday urging lawmakers to hasten their efforts to create a regulatory framework for crypto.

entry.title: Azuki Twitter Account Hacked, Attacker Drains Over $750K in 30 Minutes
entry.summary: If a mint seems random and suspicious, it's because it is.

entry.title: Can You Get a Refund on Porsche, Yuga or Other NFTs? It Depends
entry.summary: NFT companies that failed to acknowledge an obscure 1997 law may be obligated to refund European customers in full for past purchases.

entry.title: Argo Blockchain Lawsuit Alleges Bitcoin Miner ‘Misrepresented’ Pre-IPO Finances
entry.summary: The suit alleges that Argo failed to properly disclose risks surrounding energy costs and network issues at the time of the IPO.

entry.title: Crypto Firm Matrixport Slashes Headcount by 10%
entry.summary: Billionaire Jihan Wu is downsizing the firm’s marketing division amid reports of leadership changes at Matrix Asset Management.

entry.title: How Web3 Is Disrupting Video Streaming: Myco, Theta Labs, and Actor David Bianchi
entry.summary: At an investor event in L.A. hosted by watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Sander Lutz moderated a discussion about Film3 with Myco CCO Phil McKenzie, Theta Labs BD Head Andrea Berry, and actor and filmmaker David Bianchi, whose Web3 series "RZR" got funding through NFT drops.

entry.title: Moody’s Mulls Stablecoin Scores as Regulators Circle: Report
entry.summary: Moody's Corporation is reportedly turning its attention to stablecoins, developing a scoring system for up to 20 cryptocurrencies.

entry.title: Polygon Soars 8% Ahead of zkEVM Network Update
entry.summary: Investors are pouring into MATIC ahead of a new update that could improve Polygon’s ability to scale and integrate with Ethereum.

entry.title: FBI Infiltrated Hive Network, Blocking Over $130 Million in Crypto Ransomware
entry.summary: Law enforcement infiltrated the group and provided over 1,300 decryption keys to would-be victims, ultimately dismantling the network.

entry.title: Phantom Wallet Claims It Thwarted Over 18K Attacks
entry.summary: The developers of the popular Solana wallet say protecting its users from malicious attacks is a top priority.

entry.title: Senator Ted Cruz Wants Vendors to Accept Bitcoin at the Capitol
entry.summary: The Texas lawmaker introduced a resolution to prioritize crypto for payments within parts of Capitol Hill.

entry.title: Critical Hit? Dungeons & Dragons-Inspired Web3 Game Pivots Amid NFT Ban
entry.summary: The Glimmering creator Gripnr is ditching the official Open Game License as D&D publisher Wizards of the Coast rejects Web3.

entry.title: SEC Rejects Another Spot Bitcoin ETF Bid by ARK and 21Shares
entry.summary: ARK has yet to convince regulators that its ETF can protect investors from market manipulation.

entry.title: How Web3 and NFTs Are Disrupting Film: Myco, Livepeer, Ava Labs, Bad Grrls Creative Club
entry.summary: At an investor event in New York hosted by the watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Dan Roberts moderated a lively chat about Film3 with Phil McKenzie from Myco, Toni Thai Sterrett the founder of NFT member collective Bad Grrls Creative Club, Doug Petkanics the founder of decentralized video hosting platform Livepeer, and Daniel Killeen of Avalanche blockchain developer Ava Labs.

entry.title: Musician Arden Jones Wants to Pay Off Your Parking Tickets by Selling NFTs
entry.summary: The Atlantic Records artist dropped his hit song “Parallel Parking” as an NFT and will use the funds to pay off others’ parking tickets.

entry.title: Farokh Radio: Can a Red Hot NFT Talk Platform Grow Beyond Its Host?
entry.summary: Farokh Sarmad is trying to turn Rug Radio into the first Web3 media empire. He won’t be able to do it alone.

entry.title: Mango Labs Sues Avraham Eisenberg Over Mango Markets Exploit
entry.summary: The civil lawsuit from Mango Labs against Eisenberg is in addition to three additional cases brought by the DOJ, CFTC and SEC.

entry.title: Backed by Jay-Z, Web3 Hardware Startup Spatial Labs Raises $10 Million
entry.summary: Founder Iddris Sandu opens up about his crypto hardware play and brainstorming with his ‘big brother’ celebrity investor.

entry.title: Bitcoin Jumps 11% in the Week, Ethereum Continues Green Streak
entry.summary: Both Bitcoin and Ethereum have consolidated over the week as the broader crypto market continues to enjoy a bullish spell.

entry.title: How To Explore the Decentraland Metaverse
entry.summary: Discover how to explore the Decentraland metaverse with our step-by-step guide.

entry.title: Tesla Reports $34M Impairment Charge on Bitcoin Holdings in Q4 2022
entry.summary: Elon Musk’s electric vehicle company kept its Bitcoin position steady in the previous quarter, however, the value of the investment declined.

entry.title: Right-Wing Arizona Senator Pushes to Recognize Bitcoin as Legal Tender
entry.summary: A self-professed member of the Oath Keepers, Arizona Senator Wendy Rogers proposed several amendments, including making Bitcoin legal tender.

entry.title: Dutch Central Bank Fines Coinbase $3.6M for Non-Compliance
entry.summary: Though Coinbase registered on September 22, 2022, the Dutch Central Bank said it had a competitive advantage by not paying supervisory fees,

entry.title: Crypto Industry 'Scared of a Strong SEC': Sen. Elizabeth Warren
entry.summary: Kicking off an hour-long session, she laid out the case for the SEC to step up its scrutiny of crypto.

entry.title: FTX Creditors Include Apple, Netflix and Coinbase, Court Documents Reveal
entry.summary: The expansive creditor matrix encompasses numerous businesses in several countries caught up in the collapse of FTX.

entry.title: Marvel Iron Man Artist Sean Chen: Web3 Is a ‘Paradigm Shift’ for Comic Creators
entry.summary: After a prolific career as a comic book artist for Marvel, DC Comics, and Valiant, Sean Chen shares why he left to create his own series in Web3.

entry.title: What's Going On With the Price of Aptos?
entry.summary: The APT token is up a remarkable 350% since the start of the year. Why? Here's what the available data shows.

entry.title: 'Iron Man' Comic Artist Sean Chen on Marvel vs. Web3
entry.summary: Marvel and DC Comics alum Sean Chen argues that while studios have made billions, comic artists aren't seeing even a fraction of that wealth.

entry.title: Marvel Artist Sean Chen on How Artificial Intelligence Will Shape Comics
entry.summary: "Eventually there's still a human brain that needs to be involved," Chen said of AI being used to create comics.

entry.title: Hackers Take Over Robinhood Twitter Account To Promote Scam
entry.summary: The scammers used the account to promote a fake token and NFT sale to over a million followers.

entry.title: Proof Founder Kevin Rose Just Had Over $1M Worth of NFTs Stolen From His Wallet
entry.summary: Rose lost 40 NFTs in total, including an Autoglyphs NFT worth almost $500,000, in what may be a phishing attack.

entry.title: 'Bitcoin Jesus' Roger Ver Says He Doesn't Have to Pay the $21M He Owes Genesis
entry.summary: "Genesis was required by our agreement to remain solvent," the Bitcoin evangelist wrote in a post on Reddit.

entry.title: Nifty Gateway Co-Founders Step Down as Cock Foster Twins Seek to Start New Company
entry.summary: The Cock Foster twins’ decision comes after launching the NFT marketplace five years ago.

entry.title: BlockFi Creditor Committee Advisor Reveals $1.2B Exposure to FTX, Alameda Research
entry.summary: Unredacted financials revealed that crypto lender BlockFi’s exposure to both FTX and Alameda was much larger than the firm first reported.

entry.title: Ethereum NFT Hit Doodles Will Launch Doodles 2 on Flow Blockchain
entry.summary: One of the most successful Ethereum NFT projects is choosing the home of NBA Top Shot for its follow-up series.

entry.title: Stablecoin Issuer 'Does Not Blame SEC' for Derailing $9B Plans to Go Public
entry.summary: Despite failing to approve Circle's registration 15 months after it was filed, Circle "does not blame" the SEC for the botched SPAC deal.

entry.title: Dogecoin, Cardano Lead Crypto Dip as Market Sheds $27B Overnight
entry.summary: Despite the hefty losses across the board, cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin and Cardano have enjoyed a heady start to the new year.

entry.title: Celsius Hints at New Token Launch as Part of Restructuring Plan: Report
entry.summary: Insolvent crypto lender Celsius is reportedly mulling the launch of a new digital token as part of a plan to compensate its creditors.

entry.title: France Gives Crypto Firms More Time to Comply
entry.summary: Instead of rushing to implement a stringent licensing regime, a new amendment means France will wait on EU-wide ruling to arrive.

entry.title: Firm Taps NFTs to Token Gate Bars, Bathrooms at Mardi Gras
entry.summary: New Orleans-based Web3 firm NieuxCo aims to relieve collectors of the stress of finding a place “to go.”

entry.title: Actor and Filmmaker David Bianchi Previews His Web3 Series ‘RZR’
entry.summary: With solid backing, the veteran actor aims to take audiences on a wild, crypto-fueled ride.

entry.title: Blockstream Raises $125 Million for Mining Despite Industry Bloodbath
entry.summary: Blockstream is deploying more capital toward expanding its hosting services.

entry.title: Actor David Bianchi Previews His Web3 TV Series 'RZR'
entry.summary: Veteran actor David Bianchi spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson right before a public table read for Bianchi's upcoming drama series "RZR," to be distributed through Gala Films. The show is already greenlit and will be set in a dystopian future Los Angeles, with Ethereum and other digital assets as part of the plot. Bianchi also conducted two NFT drops to build engagement from fans.

entry.title: gm: Farokh and the Rug Radio Roadmap
entry.summary: Meet Mr. NFT: @Farokh, who preaches daily to hundreds of thousands of NFT faithful, and is trying to building Rug Radio into a fully formed Web3 media company. Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin from the gm podcast talk to Farokh about Rug DAO and all things NFT culture. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: gm: Big Bold Predictions for Crypto in 2023
entry.summary: Will Sam Bankman-Fried serve prison time? Who will be the next crypto company to go bankrupt, or the next founder to see their reputation dissolve? Will we get a new crypto law this year? Decrypt's Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Matthew Diemer of the gm podcast crew kicked off the new year by trading predictions for 2023. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Walking the Red Carpet at The Crypties 2022
entry.summary: Sander on the Street is back! Decrypt's Sander Lutz walked the red carpet and accosted attendees as they arrived at the inaugural Crypties awards gala in December 2022 at Art Basel in Miami, presented by Decrypt Studios.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Highlight Reel
entry.summary: In December 2022 at Art Basel in Miami, Decrypt Studios held the inaugural Crypties awards gala. With emcee Josh Ostrovsky ("The Fat Jewish") and presenters from a range of crypto projects, statuettes were awarded in nine categories. The evening was sponsored by Polygon, Filecoin Foundation, Lamina1, Async, BeetsDAO, The Gold Mask, Gem Set, Breakout, Anonymous, Infinite Objects, Ape Water, Decentralized Pictures, and Vault 721.
